front.title: MetaLinkHeaders: Mirrors and Checksums in HTTP Headers

abstract.t: This document specifies MetaLinkHeaders: Mirrors and Checksums in HTTP Headers, an alternative representation of Metalink, instead of the usual XML-based download description format. MetaLinkHeaders describes multiple download locations (mirrors), Peer-to-Peer, checksums, digital signatures, and other information using existing standards. Clients can transparently use this information to make file transfers more robust and reliable.
